title: Will Riot reset my normals MMR???
body: Getting dumpstered every game gets tedious after a while, I wanna play against people I wont go 0/8 against.

replies.body: It's always been around, I like to play with my diamond and gold friends so I can get higher elo players in Norms. I maybe a Bronze player but I can play with Diamonds and Golds.

I never knew about this normals mmr. Hmm, they would probably reset every season just like in ranked.
{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}
I suppose its something they could consider.
